CustomField.description: Specifies the notification recipients for Default Assignments for Jira batch notifications sent via Chatter, email or tasks. The value is a list of email addresses separated by semicolons (;). If left blank, the user who started the process is notified.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the notification recipients for Default Assignments for Jira batch notifications sent via Chatter, email or tasks. The value is a list of email addresses separated by semicolons (;). If left blank, the user who started the process is notified.
CustomField.label: Notification Recipients
